alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 2:24PM AKST until January 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph especially near the Brooks Range. Wind chills as low as 55 below. * WHERE...Northeastern Brooks Range. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 55 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
